update device_info
device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cloud_id = #{cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icc_id = #{iccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_key = #{deviceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_state = #{deviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trace = #{trace,jdbcType=BIGINT},
space_nu = #{spaceNu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
machine_nu = #{machineNu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_uuid = #{deviceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
soft_version = #{softVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hard_version = #{hardVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agreement_version = #{agreementVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_model = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_signal = #{deviceSignal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
network_type = #{networkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
network_operator = #{networkOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_ip = #{deviceIP,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where device_uuid = #{deviceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

trace = #{trace,jdbcType=INTEGER},
soft_version = #{softVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hard_version = #{hardVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agreement_version = #{agreementVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where device_uuid = #{deviceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update device_info
sole_uid = #{soleUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
place_uid = #{placeUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id in
${item}
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM powerbank p WHERE p.device_uuid = #{deviceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT di.*,duv.version,duv.url duv_url,duv.file_name,duv.port ,duv.hard_version new_hard_version,duv.device_model new_device_model,duv.up_username,duv.up_password FROM device_info di, (SELECT * FROM device_upgrade_version WHERE is_valid=1 AND is_final=1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1 )duv WHERE CAST(INSERT(duv.hard_version,1,1,'') AS SIGNED) > CAST(INSERT(di.hard_version,1,1,'') AS SIGNED) AND di.device_state > 0
and di.device_uuid = #{deviceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT di.*,duv.version,duv.url duv_url,duv.file_name,duv.port ,duv.agreement_version new_agreement_version,duv.device_model new_device_model,duv.up_username,duv.up_password FROM device_info di, (SELECT * FROM device_upgrade_version WHERE is_valid=1 AND is_final=1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1 )duv WHERE CAST(INSERT(duv.agreement_version,1,1,'') AS SIGNED) > CAST(INSERT(di.agreement_version,1,1,'') AS SIGNED) AND di.device_state > 0
and di.device_uuid = #{deviceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update device_info set created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cloud_id = #{cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icc_id = #{iccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_key = #{deviceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_state = #{deviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trace = #{trace,jdbcType=BIGINT}, space_nu = #{spaceNu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, machine_nu = #{machineNu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_uuid = #{deviceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, soft_version = #{softVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hard_version = #{hardVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_version = #{agreementVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_model = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_signal = #{deviceSignal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, network_type = #{networkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, network_operator = #{networkOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_ip = #{deviceIP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sole_uid = #{soleUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place_no = #{placeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_uid = #{agentUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT di.*,SUM(orp.money) all_day_money,COUNT(1) order_count FROM (SELECT * FROM order_rent_pay WHERE TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS(finish_time) = 1 AND order_state=2)orp LEFT JOIN device_info di
ON di.device_uuid=orp.device_uuid
GROUP BY device_uuid
mapper.update: UPDATE device_info SET device_state = 0 WHERE cloud_id != null
